alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Red River; Titus; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:04AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Franklin, northern Wood, Titus and southwestern Red River Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 702 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms near Emory and Mount Vernon, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Winnsboro, Hagansport, Mount Vernon, Bogata, Wilkerson, Cookville, Pleasant Grove, Purley, Lake Fork Reservoir, Forest Hill, Winfield, Talco, Yantis, Miller`s Cove, Hopewell, Harts Bluff, Monticello, Cuthand and Cypress. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for northeastern Texas.
